group_1.textRight: ...So, what kind of book do you want?
Yeah, I'm not expecting a response!@I'm just thinking out loud.
Is it really a book you want to begin with?
Personally, I just can't be sure that's what it is...

group_1.textLeft: (Well, she's right.)
(It was only recently...)
(...that we started seeing each other every day.)

group_1.textRight: Hm...@Is that a meaningful smile, Kira?

group_1.textLeft: (Huh? Does it look that way?)

group_1.textRight: That expression...!@I'm right, aren't I?!

group_1.textLeft: (I'm just genuinely surprised.)

group_1.textRight: I get it... After what Komachi said, I thought you@wanted a book.
I guess I should've been more suspicious...?

group_1.textLeft: (This is really starting to spiral out of control,@isn't it?)

group_1.textCenter: If I were to receive any gift, I'd prefer a book.

group_1.textRight: If you'd come up with this whole game by that point,
then what you said back there must've been@a red herring!
So this is the mystery you've plotted, Kira...

group_1.textLeft: (I'm not doing this for sport....)
(Is Mihono the type of person who jumps to@conclusions at full force?)
(Did she have friends who made her like this...?)

group_1.textRight: If it isn't a book...then it has to be chocolate!

group_1.textLeft: (She's going in reverse?!)

group_1.textRight: Aw yeah, I think I nailed it!
...Wait, you don't like chocolate?

group_1.textLeft: Quite the contrary.@I like it, but I'm very picky about it.

group_1.textRight: So you must've been pretending...@No, it was all part of your plan!
You want me to guess the exact kind of chocolate@you want!

group_1.textLeft: (I never would have imagined just how hard@communication would be...)
(...as soon as you can't use any kind of language...)

group_1.textRight: There are so many different types of chocolate@in the world!
I'm going to start listing them off.
If I say something you like, please give me a signal!

group_1.textLeft: (...I give up.)
(I feel just like the protagonist of "The Boy Who@Became a Coin.")
(I understand his pain far too well...)

group_1.textRight: Let's see...@Ganache! Chocolate pie!
Hot chocolate! No, wait, hot cocoa!
...Hmm. Not seeing any response from you.
Well, you did warn us you were picky about these@things!

group_1.textLeft: (...I don't really want chocolate to begin with.)

group_1.textRight: Then, lemme think of the things I like...@Chocolate with nuts!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:304001:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
(I'm sorry...I know there are many people who like it,@but I just...don't.)
(If it isn't done just right...)
(...sometimes it's more "nuts" than "chocolate!")

group_1.textRight: That reaction!@That's it, right?!

group_1.textLeft: (What the...?)

group_1.textRight: How about the ones covered with crunchy nuts, too?
Crispy nuts, crunchy nuts...the more nuts,@the better!

group_1.textLeft: ("Crispy" and "crunchy" are two of my least favorite@textures...)

group_1.textRight: Wow! I never would've thought we'd connect over@something like this!
*Giggle* That's one gift down!

group_1.textLeft: (It'd be impossible to correct this misunderstanding@by now...)
(...and without being able to say a word.)
(...Well, that's fine.)
(Komachi knows exactly what to get for me.)
(And perhaps I can take the nut chocolate home@and give it to my parents...)

group_1.textRight: I just know you'll be thrilled with your gift!
